ygData.subject: another wild goose chase (quest related, not specifically bards)
ygData.msgSnippet: Though I would throw something... ANYTHING out here to get us off bards and melee: A GM last night on Veeshan dropped the hint that the blued two-handed
ygData.messageBody:
Though I would throw something... ANYTHING out here to get us off bards and
melee:

A GM last night on Veeshan dropped the hint that the blued two-handed
warhammer's quest involving turning in the 4 crystal staves to someone *was*
working (as opposed to the cries of "its broken" that near deafened me in
Najena a few nights ago)...

So, we bards being the keepers of lore, does anyone know who exactly we turn
them in to?

To the best of my knowledge the Slime Crystal Staff pop's on King Xrob in
the gorge, the Ice Crystal Staff comes from Permafrost (imagine that), but I
don't know on who, the Water Crystal Staff is on a named aqua goblin,
Webclaw, in Lake Rathe and the last one, the Fire Crystal Staff, I have no
idea.

I have a slime crystal staff right now just because I like the look even if
the proc is resisted far too often... At any rate, this appears to be one
quest were the reward is worth the effort so I'd like to do it before Verant
finds out and changes it to a Rusty Red Three-Handed Skirmish Stick. :)

Thanks,
-GW
<Scummy & Sicarius @ Veeshan>
